Class FlipFitGymOwnerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitGymOwnerDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
public class FlipFitGymOwnerDAO extends Object implements FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for Gym Owner operations.

gamma-group

    Fetches a list of all gym owners from the db that have sent an approval request to the admin, i.e., their approval status is "Pending"

    • loginGymOwner

      public boolean loginGymOwner(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the user by fetching details from the db and logs in that user, if successful.
      Parameters:
      username - unique username of the user
      password - password of the user
      Returns:
      whether login was successful or not (true/false)

    • registerGymOwner

      public void registerGymOwner(FlipFitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner with the GMS platform and adds the details to DB. Initially, this gym owner is not approved
      Specified by:
      registerGymOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - complete GymOwner object of a new gym owner

    • getPendingGymOwnerList

      public List<FlipFitGymOwner> getPendingGymOwnerList()
      Fetches a list of all gym owners from the db that have sent an approval request to the admin, i.e., their approval status is "Pending"
      Specified by:
      getPendingGymOwnerList in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Returns:
      list of GymOwner objects with approval status as Pending

    • sendOwnerApprovalRequest

      public void sendOwnerApprovalRequest(String gymOwnerId)
      A gym owner sends an approval request to the admin so that they get approved in order to list their gym centres with GMS
      Specified by:
      sendOwnerApprovalRequest in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the id of the GymOwner who wants to send a req

    • setPendingGymOwnerList

      Sets the list of pending gym owners. Note: Implementation may vary based on system requirements.
      Specified by:

    • validateGymOwner

      public void validateGymOwner(String gymOwnerId, boolean isApproved)
      Admin calls this function to validate (approve/disapprove) a gymOwner
      Specified by:
      validateGymOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the id of the GymOwner who is being validated
      isApproved - approval status, 0: Not Approved, 1: Approved, 2: Pending
